string-array.name: changes
string-array.item: Bugfix release: Have volume control in song detail activity too, disable voice buttons while playing tones, play tones longer for individual voices.
Bugfix release: Call release() on MediaPlayer instances after using them.
Feature release: New song activity that shows details for the song when tapping a song list entry and lets the user push buttons to play back certain voices\' tones again.
Inital release: Supports downloading a song csv file, showing a list of songs and playing the intonation for each of them.
